Стратегия развития и ответы на вопросы: Development Strategy and Answers to Questions
19 июня 2025 года Шәкәрім Университет бы: On June 19, 2025, Shakarim University was officially included in the QS World University Rankings 2026 - one of the most prestigious and influential global university rankings. Among them were 20 institutions from Kazakhstan, including three newcomers - and Shakarim University is proud to be one of them, entering the top 18% of the best universities in the world.
Шәкәрім Университет занимает позицию #50: Shakarim University ranks #501-520 among 985 universities in Asia.
Рейтинг 1351-1400 среди 1744 университет: Ranked 1351-1400 among 1744 universities from 107 countries. Top 10 among Kazakhstani universities.
В 2025 году Шәкәрім Университет дебютиро: In 2025, Shakarim University made its debut in the prestigious global THE Impact Rankings, which assesses universities' contributions to the UN Sustainable Development Goals.
Система международного рейтинга QS Stars: The QS Stars international ranking system awarded our university a 4-star rating.
662-е место среди самых экологически чис: 662nd place among the world's most environmentally friendly educational institutions, 8th place among universities in Kazakhstan.
19-е место среди 84 университетов в рейт: 19th place among 84 universities in the ranking of educational institutions by scientific productivity and publication activity.
44-е место среди 103 университетов Казах: 44th place among 103 universities in Kazakhstan in the ranking of Kazakhstani university websites according to the Independent Agency for Quality Assurance in Education.
20-е место среди 97 университетов Казахс: 20th place among 97 universities in Kazakhstan in the ranking of universities by scientific publications according to the Independent Agency for Quality Assurance in Education.
Результаты рейтинга образовательных прог: The results of the educational programs rating of Shakarim University were presented on the official website of the National Chamber of Entrepreneurs of the Republic of Kazakhstan «Atameken».
Институциональная аккредитация подтвержд: Institutional accreditation confirms the university's compliance with established standards of educational quality and organizational and managerial activities.
Институциональная аккредитация Независим: Institutional accreditation by the Independent Agency for Accreditation and Rating (IAAR).
Institutional accreditation by the Independent Agency for Accreditation and Expertise of Education Quality (ARCA).
Институциональная реаккредитация Независ: Institutional reaccreditation by the Independent Agency for Recognition and Quality Assurance in Education (ARCA) for a period of 7 years.

это современный учебно-методический, нау: is a modern educational-methodological, scientific and cultural center of the northeastern region of Kazakhstan
это вуз, образованный на базе педагогиче: is a university formed on the basis of pedagogical, zoo-veterinary, financial-economic and technological institutes
это многопрофильный вуз с богатым опытом: is a multidisciplinary university with rich work experience
на 5 факультетах обучаются около 7 тысяч: at 5 faculties, about 7 thousand students, master's and doctoral students study in 45 bachelor's degree programs, 37 master's programs and 10 PhD doctoral programs
это востребованный высококвалифицированн: is a sought-after highly qualified faculty consisting of 971 teachers and staff, including 28 doctors of science and professors, 155 candidates of science and associate professors, 181 masters
с 2004 года внедрена кредитная технологи: credit learning technology has been implemented since 2004. Since 2009, training has been carried out on the basis of distance educational technologies (DET)
это качественная учебно-методическая и м: is a high-quality educational-methodological and powerful material-technical base. There are 12 academic buildings, educational and scientific laboratories and workshops with modern equipment, a scientific library with a rich book collection (more than 700 thousand books), with a media library and study hall, computer parking (more than 1300 computers), a swimming pool and 2 gyms, 2 sports complexes with a specially equipped football field, 1 sports hall, a medical center with therapeutic and preventive equipment, Student House, apartment-type dormitories
70 ученых университета являются обладате: 70 university scientists are holders of the state grant 'Best University Teacher'
это крупный вуз с широкими международным: is a large university with extensive international connections. Cooperates with universities in the USA, China, Mongolia, Germany, the Netherlands, Great Britain, Japan, Turkey, Czech Republic, Slovenia, Poland, Russia, Republic of Belarus, Ukraine and Baltic countries. Is a member of authoritative international organizations
